name: Monkey Mart for Chrome™
description: Are you a fan of the fun and entertaining Monkey Mart game? If so, then you shouldn’t miss this Monkey Mart game.

content_security_policy.sandbox: sandbox allow-scripts; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' blob: 'unsafe-inline'; object-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' blob: 'unsafe-inline';child-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' blob: 'unsafe-inline' ; worker-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' blob: 'unsafe-inline'; script-src-elem 'self' 'unsafe-eval' blob: 'unsafe-inline'
